com.connectsdk.service.capability

Interface TVControl

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CapabilityMethods
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetcastTVService, WebOSTVService

    public interface TVControl
extends CapabilityMethods

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  TVControl.ChannelListener
      Success block that is called upon successfully getting the current channel's information.
      static interface  TVControl.ChannelListListener
      Success block that is called upon successfully getting the channel list.
      static interface  TVControl.ProgramInfoListener
      Success block that is called upon successfully getting the current program's information.
      static interface  TVControl.ProgramListListener
      Success block that is called upon successfully getting the program list for the current channel.
      static interface  TVControl.State3DModeListener
      Success block that is called upon successfully getting the TV's 3D mode Passes a Boolean to see Whether 3D mode is currently enabled on the TV

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.connectsdk.service.capability.CapabilityMethods

        CapabilityMethods.CapabilityPriorityLevel
